titleStmt.title: Contemplations moral and divine by a person of great learning and judgment.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid, for William Shrowsbury ... and John Leigh ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Hale. Cf. BM.
This title seems to be incomplete, with only 37 p. of a possible 2nd vol. on film.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
